text: Neal Adams (June 15, 1941 â€“ April 28, 2022)was an American comic book artist. He was the co-founder of the graphic design studio Continuity Associates. Adams co-created the characters Ra's al Ghul, Man-Bat, and John Stewart for DC Comics. Adams died on April 28, 2022 in New York City from problems caused by sepsis, aged 80. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American comics artists Category:American comics writers Category:American editors Category:American activists Category:Writers from New York City Category:Artists from New York City Category:Infectious disease deaths in New York City Category:Deaths from sepsis
title: Neal Adams
